material: metal with coated body and textured handle
usage: Strength and fitness training exercises using a 5 kg kettlebell.
key_features: Pink coated body with black textured handle
Weight marking '5 KG' printed on front
Coated body for protection and durability
ai_description: A compact 5 kg kettlebell with a bright pink coated body and a contrasting black, textured metal handle. The front clearly displays the KAKSS brand and weight marking in white. Its rounded shape and sturdy handle are designed for controlled swings and lifts in gym or home settings.
target_audience: People performing home or gym workouts who want a 5 kg kettlebell for strength and conditioning.
